problem_statement: The solution violates time complexity, thread-safety, PQ security requirements, determinism guarantees, and verification requirements. It looks sophisticated, but it does not satisfy the formal constraints of the prompt.
FAIL_TO_PASS: tests/telecomTopUP.test.ts::sendLog should return compressed data as BigInt
tests/telecomTopUP.test.ts::InlineCompressor should compress data to BigInt
tests/telecomTopUP.test.ts::compression should be deterministic (same input = same output)
tests/telecomTopUP.test.ts::LOG_BUFFER_SIZE should be 1024 (1KB)
tests/telecomTopUP.test.ts::O(1) constraint: compression output is fixed size regardless of input
tests/telecomTopUP.test.ts::sendLog should be deterministic (same input = same compression/signature)
tests/telecomTopUP.test.ts::different inputs should produce different compressed outputs
tests/telecomTopUP.test.ts::sendLog should return a 64-character hex signature
tests/telecomTopUP.test.ts::DilithiumPQSigner should sign BigInt data
tests/telecomTopUP.test.ts::signature should be deterministic (same input = same signature)
tests/telecomTopUP.test.ts::different inputs should produce different signatures
tests/telecomTopUP.test.ts::signature size should be 32 bytes (256 bits)
tests/telecomTopUP.test.ts::verifyLog should verify valid signatures
tests/telecomTopUP.test.ts::verifyLog should reject tampered compressed data
tests/telecomTopUP.test.ts::verifyLog should reject invalid signatures
tests/telecomTopUP.test.ts::compression ratio should be greater than 50% for typical logs
tests/telecomTopUP.test.ts::DilithiumPQSigner.verify should validate correct signatures
tests/telecomTopUP.test.ts::DilithiumPQSigner.verify should reject wrong signatures
tests/telecomTopUP.test.ts::DilithiumPQSigner.verify should reject signatures with wrong length
tests/telecomTopUP.test.ts::AtomicCounter should increment atomically
tests/telecomTopUP.test.ts::AtomicCounter should reset correctly
tests/telecomTopUP.test.ts::sendLog should use atomic counter for IDs
tests/telecomTopUP.test.ts::signature should not be forgeable by simple XOR
tests/telecomTopUP.test.ts::signature should not be forgeable by bit manipulation
tests/telecomTopUP.test.ts::different data should never produce same signature
tests/telecomTopUP.test.ts::FixedBufferSerializer should produce fixed-size output
tests/telecomTopUP.test.ts::sendLog output size should be constant regardless of input size
tests/telecomTopUP.test.ts::multiple calls with same input should produce identical results
tests/telecomTopUP.test.ts::sendLog should not include timestamp in compressed/signed data
tests/telecomTopUP.test.ts::telecomTopupRequest should process request with secure logging
tests/telecomTopUP.test.ts::very large input should be truncated and still work
